title: Restore and display all Version 12 content across tabs

requirements.text: Verify backend data persistence for all content types (articles, X posts, spotlights, wisdom entries, resources, cybercrime articles, home page links, and mission content) and ensure data is being retrieved correctly from the backend actor

quotes: Can you not find all my data?
I need you to find all the content I previously added

acceptanceCriteria: Backend returns all previously stored articles with titles, URLs, and thumbnails
Backend returns all X posts with screenshots and descriptions
Backend returns all ecosystem spotlights with content and images
Backend returns all investing wisdom entries with quotes and authors
Backend returns all trusted resources with names, descriptions, and URLs
Backend returns all cybercrime articles with titles, URLs, and thumbnails
Backend returns all home page links with titles, URLs, and thumbnails
Backend returns mission content with title, description, and images

requirements.text: Ensure frontend properly fetches and displays all content from Version 12 across all tabs (Mission, Latest Progress, X Posts, Ecosystem Spotlight, Investing Wisdom, Trusted Resources, Cybercrime Awareness, and Home Page Links)

quotes: All tabs should be populated with the articles, links, pictures

acceptanceCriteria: Mission tab displays mission content with title, description, and all images
Latest Progress tab shows all articles with thumbnails and titles
X Posts tab displays all uploaded screenshots with descriptions
Ecosystem Spotlight tab shows all spotlight entries with content and images
Investing Wisdom tab displays all quotes with authors
Trusted Resources tab shows all resources with names, descriptions, and URLs
Cybercrime Awareness tab displays all articles with thumbnails
Home page displays all quick links with thumbnails
All images and thumbnails render correctly across all tabs

requirements.text: Fix any data loading errors or empty states preventing content from displaying in all tabs, ensuring proper error handling and loading states for all React Query hooks

quotes: Nothing is working and I've tried many times
Where is my website that I was working on

acceptanceCriteria: React Query hooks successfully fetch data from backend actor
Loading states display correctly while fetching data
Error states show meaningful messages if data fetch fails
Empty states only appear when no data exists, not due to fetch failures
All useQueries hooks properly use the authenticated actor instance

requirements.text: Verify all CRUD operations (add, edit, delete) work correctly for all content types across all tabs
acceptanceCriteria: Add dialogs successfully create new entries for all content types
Edit dialogs successfully update existing entries with all fields
Delete buttons remove entries with confirmation dialogs
Changes persist after page refresh
Toast notifications appear for all successful operations

constraints: Do not modify the backend schema or data structures
Do not change the single-actor architecture in backend/main.mo
Do not edit immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui/*
Preserve all existing user data from Version 12
nonGoals: Adding new content types or features not mentioned
Changing the UI design or styling
Adding new tabs or navigation items
